How to Use Pending Done Answered Others
- Contains prayer items that have not yet been prayed for today.\n - Upon clicking the prayer item, it will automatically be moved to “Done”\n - Items in “Done” will be moved back to “Pending” after 24 hours (from when it was moved from "Pending" to "Done")
- Contains prayer items that were already prayed for the day\n - Items in “Done” will be moved back to “Pending” after 24 hours (from when it was moved from "Pending" to "Done")
- Contains prayer items that have been answered already.\n - To do this, press the prayer item and click the edit button (pencil icon). Click “Yes” in the “Answered” section
- Prayer items can be deleted by long pressing the prayer item, and pressing "Confirm" in the pop-up dialog
Add details about your Prayer: Title: Edit Prayer Request
About Random Bible Verse is a simple mobile application used for randomly generating Bible Verses on the fly. This can be useful when you simply want to refresh yourself with inspiring Bible Verses, or you want to share a Scripture snippet to someone else. This also now contains Prayer List Section, where you can create your custom prayer items. In the future, we\'ll also add some Bible Trivia, and playable Online Services and Original Praise and Worship Music Developer: Donate BTC: dev.jhesed@gmail.com 3DK8NFyGUJorowYDxcgkCp22hmKdEfnyS64 dev.jhesed@gmail.com
